name: Universe Generator - Remake
description:
Universe Generator - Remake

2D Procedural Universe

Universe Generator (UGR) is a 2d, low res procedural universe with billions of stars and planets.

Roadmap:

1. more star types

2.  moons

3. better name generation

4. procedural music

5. more planet types

6. planet rings

7. asteroid belts

8. more info about planet

9. planet surface view

10. planet descriptions

11. better planetary system view

Controls:

WASD - normal movement

LShift + WASD - faster movement

Mouse1 - click to view planetary systems and info about planets
